LanguageData.ArmorHelmetReconArctic.label: recon helmet (Arctic)
LanguageData.ArmorHelmetReconArctic.description: A high-tech armored helmet with a built-in status computer and a protective plasteel-weave plate.\n\nArmor like this is often used by imperial scout troops or glitterworld police forces. This armour has an arctic camo pattern.
